title: Mahindra XUV500 Crosses 1.5 Lakh Sales Mark in India
text:
Mahindra XUV500 Crosses 1.5 Lakh Sales Mark in India 3rd, Oct 2015 12:15 PM View: 0 0 Seems like Mahindra is currently having a great time in the automobile industry. Whether its the newly launched models or the existing ones, the automaker is doing quite well. After launching the unique sub-4m TUV300, there is one more good news for the company. Recently, its popular SUV named XUV500 has set a new standard by crossing the 1.5 Lakh sales mark . This 4-year old model has made a special place for itself since it was introduced for the very first time. It also received an update in the month of May, this year, which further aided in boosting sales. 
Also Read: Mahindra XUV500 Automatic As per an official statement on this occasion by Mr Pravin Shah, President & Chief Executive, Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd, “This is a proud moment for us as the XUV500 reaches this milestone. We would like to thank our customers for their support which has enabled the brand to grow from from strength to strength. This achievement reaffirms the XUV500's immense popularity as it continues to set new standards in its category.” 
Get Details on: Mahindra XUV500 This offering by Mahindra is well known for its off-road capabilities and muscular strength rather than for the cosmetic elements. The fact that it is a utility vehicle, makes it important that it should be able to serve as a tough vehicle, which it surely does. And hence, it has been able to perform so well with such an impressive sale. Its 2.2 litre mHawk diesel motor is able to churn out 140Bhp at 3,750 rpm and 330 Nm at 1,600-2,800 rpm. The power is transmitted to front wheels via a 6-speed manual gearbox. Besides the standard FWD setup, an AWD unit is also offered as an optional facility.
